answers.author: Pamela Muse
answers.text:
Sandra – I hope the following is helpful:
Model Purchasing Manual for Texas Cities and Counties 2010
http://www.texasahead.org/lga/finances/purchasing/96-449_Model_Purchasing_Manual_11_10.pdf 
Houston, TX – Procurement Manual
http://www.houstontx.gov/legal/coh_procurementmanual.pdf
Fresno, CA - FINANCE DEPARTMENT PURCHASING DIVISION PROCUREMENT HANDBOOK
http://www.fresno.gov/NR/rdonlyres/83995EC3-D0F3-42F7-A88B-D05E317D342F/21583/WIPProcurementHandbookFinalRevision21712.pdf
Chattanooga, TN - PROCUREMENT INSTRUCTIONAL MANUAL
http://www.chattanooga.gov/general-services-files/purchasing/PurchasingManual.pdf
Melbourne, FL – Purchasing Manual
http://www.melbourneflorida.org/purchase/Purch_Manual.pdf
Pamela Muse
West Regional Director
Alliance for Innovation
pmuse@transformgov.org
www.transformgov.org 
888-468-6450
480-231-3538 Text

author: Sandra Eller
text: Does anyone have a purchasing handbook or user guide that you can share?
title: Purchasing Handbook/Guide
